name: Space Defenders (itch) (Felipe Kim)
description:
In this game you will fight against a horde of enemy spaceships as the last line of earth's defenses, but you will not be alone, you will have a companion by your side.

This game was made as a project for Faculdade Melies using Photon servers.

Made By:

Felipe Kim - https://felipemkim.itch.io

Gabriel Nonenmacher - https://gabriel-nonenmacher.itch.io

Luiz Felipe - https://www.artstation.com/lyit_hostage
